name: I know a guy, who knows a guy...
name_original: I know a guy, who knows a guy...
description:
This is a game for Lost Relic gamejam.

You play as a specialist who solves people problems by bringing them together. For helping a person, he can introduce you to his connections. Expand your network and try to solve bigger problems with it.

Instructions:

  • Press on the bottom text in the intro and outro sections to skip the slides
  • LMB to interact with nods and navigate on the map
  • MW to to zoom in/out

Dev - Amir Nurlanov

Art - Nikita Golev

GD - Aleksandr Godin, Sergei Antoniuk
